Yesterday I received the comfort of your letter; but I must say that, despite appearances, I live in almost despair... You know the repugnance I have for the sea; however, if it is your will, I want to head to Rio. So send me your orders and have my clothes delivered to the Senhor. Dress yourself in patience, I recommend you again; there is your father, who will not leave you without support, and let time clarify so many mysteries. Ask the Senhor to obtain the letter I directed to compadre Belchior; keep the office of the judge, letters from Mateus and Viana, as well as correspondence that I had removed, and comes with the response from the "Editor": for everything will serve for my defense. In the clothes, just a frock coat, the muslin robe, the two in chita, all the white and black trousers, white and black stockings, shirts and hat.
